name: Get Achievements for Achievements
description:
The main goal of this game is to get achievements. You don't even need to play it – the game itself will give them to you. If you're polite to her…

This is a short sketch exploring such a phenomenon in the world of computer games as "trophy hunting". Complete the tasks that the game gives you, get all-new achievements for them, test yourself – will you dare to collect them all?

Is this a visual novel?
Is this a dating simulator?
Is this an experiment?
This:
  • Short duration
  • Psychedelic pixel visual style
  • Many achievements
  • A lot of achievement!
